Cookie Panel

Das Plugin CryptoPanel Payment Gateway für Shopware erlaubt die Benutzung des Payment-Gateways CryptoGate, welches auch als OpenSource Variante verfügbar ist.

Payment options for Dash, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash and Lightcoin are made possible.

An open source payment gateway can be used that is available here in the source code:

https://github.com/lampsolutions/CryptoGate
